```{r Exercise 2.1}
myCop.norm <- ellipCopula(family="normal", dim=3, dispstr="ex", param = 0.4)
x1 <- rCopula(500, myCop.norm)
scatterplot3d(x1)

rho1 = cor(x1[,1], x1[,2])
rho2 = cor(x1[,1], x1[,3])
rho3 = cor(x1[,2], x1[,3])

#Kendall
t1 = 2/pi*asin(rho1)
t2 = 2/pi*asin(rho2)
t3 = 2/pi*asin(rho3)

t1_theo = 2/pi*asin(0.4) # Completely theoretical

cor.test(x1[,1], x1[,2], method="kendall") 
cor.test(x1[,1], x1[,3], method="kendall")
cor.test(x1[,2], x1[,3], method="kendall")

#Spearman
rho_s1 = 6/pi*asin(rho1/2)
rho_s2 = 6/pi*asin(rho2/2)
rho_s3 = 6/pi*asin(rho3/2)

cor.test(x1[,1], x1[,2], method="spearman") 
cor.test(x1[,1], x1[,3], method="spearman")
cor.test(x1[,2], x1[,3], method="spearman")

rho_s_theo = 6/pi*asin(0.2)


(rho_Ss1 = cor(rank(x1[,1]), rank(x1[,2])))
(rho_Ss2 = cor(rank(x1[,1]), rank(x1[,3])))
(rho_Ss3 = cor(rank(x1[,2]), rank(x1[,3])))

```

```{r Exercise 2.4}
gammaRand <- function(n,theta){
   B= 1/theta
   M=runif(n)
   E = rexp(2*n)
   dim(E) = c(2,n)
   E=t(E)
   U = E/M
   sample = B/(U+B)
  
}
(gammaRand(2, 0.5))

```

```{r Exercise 8}
#Calculating theta nad rho from tau= 0.5 gives rho 
Gauss <- mvdc( ellipCopula(family="normal", dim=2, dispstr="ex", param = 0.7), margins=c("lnorm", "lnorm"), paramMargins = list(list(mean=0, sd=1), list(mean=0, sd=1)))#have to give Marginparams as list of list.

prob_t = 1- pMvdc(c(u,u), t_cop)
prob_gumb =1- pMvdc(c(u,u), gumb)

r1 = prob_gauss/prob_t
r2 = prob_gauss/prob_gumb

r1a = prob_gauss/prob_t
```
